reviews.review: It's amazing, both as a game and as a form of media in general.

Como definir Bioshock Infinite... Game of the Year podria ser, lamentablemente salio el mismo año que el The Last of Us. Graficos geniales, jugabilidad buenisima, ambientacion sobervia. Una compra de la que no es posible arrepentirse.

BioShock Infinite is a round product. His story grabs you from the first minute, I sweetened with the charisma of the characters and you take a picture with this end so well structured. I admit that the gameplay has been simplified, especially if compared with the first BioShock, but this flaw is blurred by the quality of the other sections. Of course I locate one of the best games of the year. ;)

A game that I enjoy quite a lot but ultimately was a disappointment. Solid graphics and great art style create an amazing atmosphere that sucks you in. The lackluster combat and its frequency hampers this. Many times I just wished to explore and enjoy the world but was interupted by annoying enemies. An interesting story that tries a bit too hard but is still good. I felt the game was too short. Seems to end just as it was getting good. If you enjoyed the previous Bioshocks then I would definitely recommend this just don't expect it to set the world on fire.
brilliant game get it befor the sale is over or you will pay 80 bucks for it- i got it for twenty you must get it NOW

Вы когда-нибудь пробовали писать диссертацию после великолепного путешествия по экзотической стране? Примерно такая же задача стоит перед любым обозревателем BioShock Infinite . Чувство блаженной счастливой усталости переполняет тебя после прохождения, хочется спокойно возродить в памяти лучшие моменты прошедшего дня или повторить празднование. Ведь именно таково творение Irrational Games . BioShock Infinite — геймерский праздник, вызывающий буйство эмоций и мыслей....

Достоинства: потрясающий дизайн; захватывающая атмосфера; интересный сюжет; продуманные образы персонажей; динамичные перестрелки; прекрасная Элизабет.

Недостатки: вам не стыдно сюда смотреть?

Es lohnt sich jede Ecke nach Features und Co abzusuchen. 10/10 wenn ich es bewerten müsste! Kauf hat sich wirklich gelohnt

I love and recommend this game, however, it is not as good as the big gaming websites/magazines claim it to be. I would definitely give it an 8/10 for story and gameplay, but this is nothing if not a Bioshock clone. It's Bioshock as you've NEVER seen it before, but Bioshock nonetheless. Also, it is crazy short! You can beat the game in under 10 hours. I don't know about you, but personally, a $60 game should at least give 30 hours of play. Anyway, other than those complaints it was crazy fun to play, so get it! (on sale)

Just play this game. The story alone is worth it.

The gunplay is lackluster at times, and some of the puzzles can be confusing (as in "fuck where do I go" confusing), but it never detracts from the story of this game.

And a word of warning: the ending is confusing (as in "wait what" confusing).

Overall, 9.9/10.
Dat is nice

An excellent buy at any price - a steal when its on sale on Steam.  The enviornment is rich and inviting.  The characters and voice acting are well done and the historical period from which the game plays through is at times amazing, melodic, disturbing and somber.  The issues of race, religion, oppression, sexism - all are tackled in the game - and at times can make you feel uneasy until you progress further to see how it all interwines together.  I am not a first person shooter fan - but I find myself coming back every day to play more.  If you are looking for a straight up shooting fest where you just run around shooting as many bad guys as you can find - this is not for you.  If you are looking for great storytelling, immersive characters, excellent graphics all wrapped around shooting the bad guys, picking up weapons, loot etc etc....by all means buy the game.  Turn up the volume, turn off the lights and enjoy the journey.

This is the best game I've played in a long time. I haven't played the other games in BioShock series yet, but loved the gameplay and the story of BioShock Infinite. I'm not very good on FPS games, but was able to complete this one, and look forward for other games like this.

This game is a must buy to anyone who enjoy's story driven FPS's.

Сразу скажу - считаю первые 2 игры серии херней. В эту решил сыграть только к концу года, так как многие твердили - это игра года. Друзья, о чём вы, какая это игра года? Вы играли в GTAV или в Last of Us? Нет? У вас нет консоли? Тогда ваше мнение никого не инетерсует и не имеет значения, так как оно не объективно. В целом картинка в игре неплохая. Такая смесь мультяшности и реальности. Очень порадовала Элизабет - очень "живой" персонаж. Но как жутер - СКУЧНО. Сюжет неплохой. В целом оставил бы игре нейтральную оценку. Точно не отрицательную. Но это не игра года, успокойтесь.
dangerously cheesey

BioShock Infinite er et spil, der foregår i et fiktivt fortidsunivers, såkaldt "Steampunk". Spillet foregår i året 1912, i en fiktiv by, der svæver rundt flere kilometer op i luften. Byen er styret af en form for teokrati, med en "Father", der betragtes som den store frelser, og alt ser idyllisk ud på overfladen. Men i virkeligheden er det et samfund præget af dyb racisme, og afspejler på mange måder USA år 1912 i det hele taget.
BioShock Infinite er mere historief0kuseret - som i øvrigt tager en masse uventede og interessante/spændende drejninger -  end f0kuseret på selve skydedelen. Og der er en masse lækre, grafiske detaljer, som man let kan bruge lang tid på at studere og nyde.
Spillet er fyldt med politiske og historiske referencer, og inddrager også en masse naturvidenskab, som kvantefysik m.m.
Så er du til FPS-spil, med stærk f0kus på historie, politiske referencer og science-fiction (jeg anser Steampunk som en form for science-fiction), så er BioShock Infinite anbefalingsværdigt.
Den eneste umiddelbare ulempe ved spillet, er at spillet er ret kort. Det gør, at spillet går fra 10 og ned til 9,5. Men til gengæld er spillet fyldt med så mange detaljer, at det sagtens kan spilles igen. Der er så mange detaljer i historien, i musikken, i omgivelserne - simpelt hen i det hele, så spillet nærmest [i]bør[/i] spilles flere gange.

As an FPS gamer i'd say that Bioshock Infinite is one of the best well made game of all time. The story takes place in the year 1912 in Columbia. A floating city in the sky witch is something diferent form the other two bioshock games. The main character in the game (witch is you) is Booker DeWitt,a veteran of the U.S. Cavalry. He's job is to birng a girl named Elisabet to somone he's in debt. The gameplay is fun but sometimes it gets repetitive at some point. The A.I. or Elisabeth is well responsive and she is very helpfull in combat. She'll throw you med kits,ammo,money,...(only if you want it). Like in the first two bioshock games you use different vigorous powers (a.k.a. plasmids) to use them on the enemy or set them as traps. The graphics of the game is BEAUTIFUL and well made. Just looking at the buildings of Columbia makes you feel like your back in time. Also the character models are well made.

For those of you who would like to know if is it worth buying it? The anwser is YES! The wright price to buy it is dooring a holliday sale witch the price can come down to 75%.
A great FPS with tons of action and shooting aspects.

Fascinating game with a great ending. I could see that twist end coming, me fighting me, but it was well done. I truly loved Elizabeth (Ann). She was alive. This is certainly a great game worth playing.

Will not start no matter what I do. 

"Bioshock Infinite has stopped working"

I have tried:

1) Reinstalling the whole game through Steam. Twice.
2) Numerous number of integrity checks.
3) Tried steam in offline mode.
4) Reinstalled steam before reinstalling the game the second time.
5) Tried blocking the BioshockInfinite.exe in Windows Firewall.
6) Many different combinations in the Nvidia Settings.
7) Underclocking the graphic card
8) Windows 8 repair install
9) Windows 8 fresh install with formatting the drive.
10) Tried Windows 7 fresh installation too
11) Running Steam .exe as administrator

And no luck. What a waste of time and money.
